seller_type.description:
The type of seller you are

            #Valid Values

            * Retailer  
            * Distributor 
            * Manufacturer
            * Other

business_structure.description:
How the business is structured

            #Valid Values
            * 'SoleProprietor' - SoleProprietor/Individual
            * 'CCorp' - C Corporation
            * 'SCorp' - S Corporation
            * 'Partnership' 
            * 'LLC' - Limited Liability Company
            * 'Trust/Estate'

estimated_annual_online_revenue.description:
The estimated amount the company makes in online revenue in one year

            #Valid Values
            * '<$1M' - less than $1 million in estimated annual online revenue
            * '$1M-$5M' - between $1 million and $5 million in estimated annual online revenue
            * '$5M-$10M' - between $5 million and $10 million in estimated annual online revenue
            * '$10M-$50M' - between $10 million and $50 million in estimated annual online revenue
            * '$50M-$200M' - between $50 million and $200 million in estimated annual online revenue
            * '>$200M' - more than $200 million in estimated annual online revenue

number_of_skus_in_catalog.description:
Approximate number of SKUs in the company's product catalog

            #Valid Values
            * '0-499' 
            * '500-4,999',
            * '5,000-19,999',
            * '20,000-49,999'
            * '>50,000'

number_of_fulfillment_nodes.description: Approximate number of fulfillment nodes the company operates

percent_of_orders_dropshipped.description:
Approximate percentage of orders that are dropshipped

            #Valid Values
            * '<10%'
            * '11%-30%'
            * '31%-50%'
            * '51%-75%'
            * '>75%'

use_fba.description: If true, the company uses fulfilled by Amazon

physical_retail_presence.description: If true, the company owns and operates physical retail stores

fulfill_from_retail.description:
If true, the company fulfills online orders from retail stores

            #Logic
            * Required if physical_retail_presence is true

in_store_pickup.description:
If true, the company offers in store pickup on online orders

            #Logic
            * Required if physical_retail_presence is true

live_inventory.description: If true, the company can provide live inventory feeds on a per fulfillment center / dropshipper basis

authorized_seller.description:
Are you an authorized seller of your products?

            #Valid Values
            * Yes, all products 
            * Yes, some products  
            * No

main_category.description:
The main category the company has for its product catalog

            #Valid Values

            * Books & Other Media
            * Baby
            * Appliances
            * Automotive Parts & Accessories
            * Arts, Crafts & Hobbies
            * Health & Beauty
            * Industrial & Scientific
            * Toys & Games
            * Clothing, Shoes & Accessories
            * Electronics
            * Pet Supplies
            * Office Products
            * Home & Garden
            * Grocery
            * Jewelry & Watches
            * Sporting Goods
            * Furniture
            * Tools & Home Improvement
            * Video Games

other_categories.description:
Please enter the other categories you sell in 

            #Valid Values

            * Books & Other Media
            * Baby
            * Appliances
            * Automotive Parts & Accessories
            * Arts, Crafts & Hobbies
            * Health & Beauty
            * Industrial & Scientific
            * Toys & Games
            * Clothing, Shoes & Accessories
            * Electronics
            * Pet Supplies
            * Office Products
            * Home & Garden
            * Grocery
            * Jewelry & Watches
            * Sporting Goods
            * Furniture
            * Tools & Home Improvement
            * Video Games

used_products.description:
Does your company sell used products?

            #Valid Values
            * Yes, all products 
            * Yes, some products  
            * No

ecommerce_domains.description: The domain where you sell your products online

other_names_in_marketplaces.description: The names the company uses to sell in other marketplaces

marketplace_integration.description:
The methods the company uses to integrate into marketplaces

            #Valid Values
            * APIIntegration - The company integrates directly with the marketplace via API
            * ChannelAdvisor - The company integrates with ChannelAdvisor
            * CommerceHub - The company integrates with CommerceHub
            * WebPortalManualManagement - The company manages marketplace orders using an web portal management tool
            * Other - A method of integration not specified here

other_integration.description: If the partner selects 'other' for marketplace integration, this field is required.

marketplace_name.description: The name of the marketplace the company sells in

name_in_marketplace.description: The name you sell under in the marketplace
